elements.MAIN_EFFECT: At Dusk — If I have 1 or more boosts: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an Artist or Song, draw it, otherwise discard it.  When I leave the Expedition zone, if I was [[Fleeting]] — []Target Character in play or in Reserve gains 2 boosts.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.

elements.MAIN_EFFECT: {R} []Target Character in play or in Reserve other than me gains 1 boost.  When my Expedition moves forward — If I have 1 or more boosts: Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an Artist or Song, draw it, otherwise discard it.
elements.ECHO_EFFECT: {I} When you play another Character with a base statistic of 0 — []I gain 1 boost, up to a max of 2.
